title: Completely Updated 2bd/1bth-Showing Sunday 8/7
posting_body: DO NOT RESPOND TO THIS ADVERTISEMENT.
VISIT WWW.SEKKINVESTMENTS.COM FOR MORE INFORMATION OR TO APPLY.
Located at 2568 Grove Way in Castro Valley, this spacious lower level apartment features new hardwood flooring and fresh paint throughout.
The kitchen has been completely updated with top of the line stainless steel appliances (including a large french door style refrigerator), new cabinetry and quartz.
This unit comes with one assigned covered parking spot and storage closet.
There is on site coin operated laundry, and we allow pets of all types and sizes.
2568 Grove is conveniently located less than a mile from Castro Valley BART and the 580 Interstate.
This small, quiet property is within walking distance to Trader Joes as well as many other Castro Valley shops and restaurants.
